name: Rebecca Rolling
text:
(Translated by Google) Gr8 company y'all!

(Original)
Gr8 company y'all!

name: Scott Ellis
text: Top concrete cutter in Alabama!! Best in the business.

name: Dean Ramsey
text: Great place, help us out of a jam and was very affordable!!

name: Lisa Henderson
text: They are fair contractors who do a great job quickly.

name: Brian Wheeler
text: I need to replace some concrete inside my garage to install a car lift. ABC Cutting came out and cut the concrete for me, made sure it was in small enough pieces for me to handle, and made sure that they were all loose. Excellent job at a great price.

name: Jonathan Bartlett
text: Great company/ employees for industrial cutting or drilling

name: John Laird
text: Great company, professional staff and employee's

name: Jon Powell
text: Fantastic operation! Best in the business!

name: S1CKLIFE
text: Horrible company management forces them to do Jobs in an unsafe manner to increase productivity or get fired somebody is going to get killed working like that

resp.text: Penhall Company's most important value IS safety.
